item.description:
July 10, 2012

 

HI!

I trust you had a nice and relaxing 4th of July weekend. The weather has been nice and sunny (sometimes hot and humid) but we cannot complain too much. AC keeps us cool...

A blessed and restful summer to you and your families.

With the summer we take a break from our monthly gatherings... Yet, don't forget to make room for "Mystics, Masters, Saints and Sages" stories of Enlightenment, by Robert Ullman and Judyth Reichenberg-Ullman. At our next gathering we will continue to share on this book... so be ready to share your reflections based on our reading of pages 175-213

So mark your calendars and know that our next meeting is schedule for September 30th, at 4:00pm

Place: is the Peace Abbey in Sherborn.

Hope to see you then. In the meantime may God bless you with happiness, good friends and inner peace. To you and yours a most blessed summer time... don't forget to rest and enjoy the beauty of nature...

all the best
Fr. Joe
Xaverian Missionaries

101 Summer Street
Holliston, MA 01746

pino.ma@gmail.com
item.name: OUR NEXT INTERFAITH BOOKCLUB MEETING
